modName: Heavy Imperial Praetorian armor - No cape
summary: Heavy and capeless replacer for JoO Imperial Praetorian.
descriptionHtml:
This is an alternative for JoO Imperial Praetorian by JackoO (imperial red version)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9205

This changes the light armor to heavy, with the exact equivalent of steel armor. I wanted it to continue the original tradition of not being overpowered. I have also removed the cape to make it more friendly towards mods like:

Cloaks of Skyrim: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092
Winter is Coming - Cloaks: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486

This is a full replacer. I would recommend uninstalling his version first to avoid possible conflicts. If you wish the other color choices simply overwrite the armor textures with the ones from his optional files.

I am uploading this with permission from the original mod owner. All credit rightfully belongs to jackoO (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/160174) for a great mod. This was my first experiment with the Creation Kit, so please don\'t make requests for things beyond my very limited skill level.
author: agm89
